comment: An outstanding and knowledgeable professor who I have had many classes with. He has given me the most practical knowledge out of any CM professor here. I will definitely be coming to him for any help on the Capstone project in summer. If I was picky, he definitely isn't good with technology or D2L. But he is very forgiving on grades because of this
rating_tags: Participation matters--Amazing lectures --Graded by few things

comment: Professor Grant is very knowledgeable and caring. He is older so he struggles with the technology side of things, but he is very understanding and makes an effort to ensure everyone will succeed. He expects you to be at every class, but for your own benefit. He just wants the best for you and for you to truly understand the material.
Great Professor! He cares about students success. You will learn valuable knowledge from him. He could improve on keeping track of assignments.
the best professor in the cm department highly reccommend

One of the best professors at KSU CM department, He wants you succeed and if you cant put in the work to go to class and participate, don't take him. He is funny and one of the most down to earth people in this department. He also shows you real world examples on the campus that can be used in your degree.

Cannot figure out how to use D2L. 
Cannot keep track of assignments. 
Terrible at informing the class of due dates.

Originally this class was made up of attendance grades and quiz grades, but ended up being only for attendance which was nice. This made attendance mandatory to pass his class, very lecture heavy, but a good professor to take this class with.
